description_for_human: Get up to date information for the latest version of Next.js including the app and pages directory.
description_for_model: Use the 'Ask Next.js' plugin to automatically fetch information on the latest versions of Next.js when it's being generated by the ChatGPT assistant. The plugin will return details about the version, features, updates, app and pages directory, and other relevant information, as well as a link to a page that has all the information. Links will always be returned and should be shown to the user. The Next.js data can be used to provide users with up-to-date and accurate information about the latest developments and versions of Next.js.
